name: russell holland
title: Budtender
coverLetter:
I have spent the last 4 years working as a security guard in a command center for Intel corp. I work in a high pressure environment. We handle all the day to day needs of the Intel employees as well as all emergencies on our campus.  

   I also have Seven years of experience in a Inbound Call Center. My charge included processing inbound and outbound call for the support that clients / participants receive as part of Tier I and Tier II processing, providing people management, as well as successful execution of Call Center processes. I am confident that my combination of Practical Work Experience has prepared me for making an immediate contribution to your company. I understand the level of Professionalism and Communication required for long-term success in this field. My Background and Professional approach to business will provide your office with a highly Productive Employee.

      I would appreciate the opportunity to discuss how my experience will be helpful to you. Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,

Russell Holland.
experience:
Experience

Securitas                                                                                    2013-Current

Working in a Command Center. I work the graveyard shift 4 nights a week. I answered phone requests from on site employees. We answer for emergencies as well as regular day to day requests. I also monitor cameras as well as fire systems. I dispatch security guards for alarms.


Pacific Interpreters                                                                    2011 – 2013

Graveyard telephone operator 2 nights a week and Graveyard Supervisor/Scheduler 3 night a week. Primary job operator function is to answer calls from mostly hospitals requesting a language interpreter to interpret to English for the Doctors and nurses. Primary Job Supervisor is to make sure my team is answering the calls properly and taking call of any needs the operators. Primary job scheduler function is to receive e-mails or voicemails from interpreters and fill requested shifts. I also documented and filled a spreadsheet for each shift with each language request we had a problem filling.



Answernet                                                                               2003 – 2010

Graveyard telephone operator working shifts of 6 to 8 hours without direct supervision. Primary job function is to receive incoming calls and redirect them to assigned on-call personnel. Key job skills include knowledge of phone system software; tact and courtesy with callers; and the ability to successfully manage multiple demands at once.

Kmart                                                                                      2002 - 2003

Day Porter. Primary job function was tending to customer service needs and ensuring shelves were adequately stocked with product.


Blockbuster                                                                             2000 - 2002

Cashier. Primary job function was ringing up customers as well as organizing and re-shelving videos and games once returned.
